<template>
<title></title>
 
</template>

<script>
  import Title from '@/components/Title.vue';
  export default {
    title: 'Loop mode / Infinite loop',
    components: {
      Title
    },
    data() {
      return {
        // slideData:[
        //   {
        //     img: img_slide2_1.jpg,
        //     title: 로봇을 만들기 위해 사람을 공부합니다,
        //     name: 
        //   }
        // ],
        swiperOption: {
          slidesPerView: 1,
          spaceBetween: 30,
          loop: true,
          pagination: {
            el: '.swiper-pagination',
            clickable: true
          },
          navigation: {
            nextEl: '.swiper-button-next',
            prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev'
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
  .swiper {
    height: 520px;
    width: 1097px;
  
    .swiper-slide {
      display: flex;
      justify-content: center;
      align-items: center;
      text-align: center;
      font-weight: bold;
    }
  }
</style>
